code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [Education_ContentCDN] --> Draft: User starts creating reservation
    Draft --> Pending: Submit reservation
    Pending --> Confirmed: Admin/System approves
    Pending --> Rejected: Admin rejects
    
    Confirmed --> InProgress: Start time reached & user checks in
    Confirmed --> Cancelled: User cancels before start
    Confirmed --> NoShow: Start time passed, no check-in
    
    InProgress --> Completed: End time reached
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Emergency cancellation
    
    Completed --> [Education_GradeSync]
    Cancelled --> [Education_LMS_Portal]
    Rejected --> [Education_ClassroomService]
    NoShow --> [Education_GradeSync]
    
    note right of Pending
        Email notification sent
        to user and admin
    end note
    
    note right of InProgress
        Resources locked
        for this user
    end note

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 接下来是关于 Education_ContentCDN 的逻辑。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'Education_ContentCDN'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
